pr_title: ported xtend inferrer code to java

timeline.message:
ported xtend inferrer code to java

Signed-off-by: Christian Dietrich <christian.dietrich@itemis.de>

timeline.author: szarnekow
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -6,12 +6,6 @@
 			<attribute name="gradle_used_by_scope" value="main,test"/>
 		</attributes>
 	</classpathentry>
-	<classpathentry including="**/*.java|**/*.xtend" kind="src" output="bin/main" path="xtend-gen">

timeline.bodyText: The bindings is no longer created by the fragment?
timeline.author: szarnekow

replies.bodyText: yes. this is what eclipse/xtext#1699 is for
replies.author: cdietrich
